Detailed Description

The manager for Rendering.

See also:
DzApp::getRenderMgr()

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzRenderMgr::RenderPriority

Possible render priorities that are used to order various operations when rendering. Most notably, DzNodes and DzMaterials are processed according to their priority when rendering.

Enumerator:
RENDER_PRIORITY_LOWEST 

The lowest priority

RENDER_PRIORITY_LOW 

A low priority

RENDER_PRIORITY_BELOW_NORMAL 

A below normal priority

RENDER_PRIORITY_NORMAL 

The normal priority

RENDER_PRIORITY_ABOVE_NORMAL 

An above normal priority

RENDER_PRIORITY_HIGH 

A high priority

RENDER_PRIORITY_HIGHEST 

The highest priority

DzRenderMgr::activeRendererChanged ( DzRenderer *  renderer  )  [signal]

Emitted when the active render engine has changed.

Parameters:
renderer The new active render engine
void DzRenderMgr::addRenderDirectory ( const QString &  directory,
bool  saveSetting = true 
) [slot]

Adds a render directory to the list.

Parameters:
directory The path of the directory to add.
saveSetting Whether or not to save the setting immediately or wait until the application exits.
bool DzRenderMgr::doRender ( DzRenderOptions *  opt = NULL  )  [slot]

Renders the scene with the given render settings. If no render settings are specified, then the current application render settings are used.

Parameters:
opt The render settings to use for the render. If NULL, the current user render settings are used.
DzRenderer * DzRenderMgr::findRenderer ( const QString &  className  )  const [slot]
Returns:
A pointer to the renderer with the given class name. NULL if a match could not be found.
DzRenderer * DzRenderMgr::getActiveRenderer (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
A pointer to the active renderer for the application. This will be NULL if no renderers are available.
QString DzRenderMgr::getLastSavedRenderPath (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The path to the last successfully saved render, otherwise an empty string.
int DzRenderMgr::getNumRenderDirectories (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The number of render directories
int DzRenderMgr::getNumRenderers (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The number of renderers available in the application
QString DzRenderMgr::getRenderDirectoryPath ( int  which  )  const [slot]
Parameters:
which The index of the render directory to be returned.
Returns:
The given render directory.
DzRenderer * DzRenderMgr::getRenderer ( int  which  )  const [slot]
Returns:
A pointer to the renderer at the given index in the list of renderers.
QObjectList DzRenderMgr::getRendererList (  )  const [slot]

Provided for DAZ Script access, plug-in developers should use renderIterator()

DzRenderOptions * DzRenderMgr::getRenderOptions (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
A pointer to the default DzRenderOptions object. This object stores the user's currently selected rendering options.
bool DzRenderMgr::hasRender (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
true if there is a render that can be saved
DzRenderMgr::hasRenderChanged ( bool  state  )  [signal]

Emitted when the value returned by DzRenderMgr::hasRender() has changed, signalling a new render operation. This signifies whether or not a call to saveLastRender() will be valid.

bool DzRenderMgr::isRendering (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
True if the application is currently rendering, false if not.
void DzRenderMgr::removeAllRenderDirectories (  )  [slot]

Removes all render directories.

bool DzRenderMgr::removeRenderDirectory ( const QString &  directory  )  [slot]

Removes the given directory from the render directory list.

Parameters:
directory The name of the render directory to remove.
Returns:
False if the directory was not found in the list.
DzRenderMgr::rendererAdded ( DzRenderer *  renderer  )  [signal]

Emitted when a new render engine is added to the manager. This only occurs at startup as plug-ins are being loaded.

Parameters:
renderer The new render engine that was added to the manager.
DzRendererIterator DzRenderMgr::rendererIterator (  )  const
Returns:
An iterator for the list of renderers available in the application
DzRenderMgr::renderFinished ( bool  succeeded  )  [signal]

Emitted just after a rendering operation is finished. This is only emitted when a render operation is performed by calling DzRenderMgr::doRender() - this includes all rendering operations that are started by the user from the interface. This may not include rendering operations performed by plug-ins, scripts, etc which do not call doRender().

Parameters:
succeeded true if the render was successful, false if the render failed or was cancelled by the user.
See also:
DzRenderMgr::renderStarting(), DzScene::renderFinished()
DzRenderMgr::renderStarting (  )  [signal]

Emitted just before a rendering operation begins. This is only emitted when a render operation is performed by calling DzRenderMgr::doRender() - this includes all rendering operations that are started by the user from the interface. This may not include rendering operations performed by plug-ins, scripts, etc which do not call doRender().

See also:
DzRenderMgr::renderFinished(), DzScene::aboutToRender()
QString DzRenderMgr::saveLastRender (  )  const [slot]

Displays a dialog for saving the last render, and saves the image(s)/movie if the user does not cancel.

Returns:
The path to the file selected and successfully saved, otherwise an empty string.
void DzRenderMgr::setActiveRenderer ( DzRenderer *  r  )  [slot]

Sets the currently active renderer for the application

void DzRenderMgr::showRenderDialog (  )  [slot]

Displays the render options dialog to the user. This only works if DAZ Studio is being run with the interface on, if the interface is off, this function does nothing.
